questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer:
To create an account:
1. Download the app from App Store
2. Tap 'Sign Up'
3. Enter your email and create a password
4. Verify your email
5. Complete your profile

questions.question: What are the system requirements?
questions.answer:
PEP requires:
• iOS 16.0 or later
• iPhone 8 or newer
• At least 100MB of storage
• Active internet connection

questions.question: How do I verify my email address?
questions.answer: After signing up, check your email for a verification link. Click the link to verify your account. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder or request a new verification email from the app.

questions.question: What are the main features of PEP?
questions.answer:
PEP offers:
• Real-time activity tracking
• Goal setting and monitoring
• Social challenges with friends
• Detailed analytics and insights
• Customizable reminders
• Achievement badges

questions.question: How do I sync my data across devices?
questions.answer: Your data automatically syncs when you're logged into the same account on multiple devices. Ensure you have an active internet connection and background app refresh is enabled.

questions.question: What subscription plans are available?
questions.answer:
PEP offers:
• Free Plan: Basic features with ads
• PEP Plus ($4.99/month): Ad-free, advanced analytics
• PEP Pro ($9.99/month): All features + coaching

All paid plans include a 7-day free trial.

questions.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
questions.answer:
To cancel:
1. Open Settings on your iPhone
2. Tap your Apple ID
3. Tap Subscriptions
4. Select PEP
5. Tap Cancel Subscription

You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.

questions.question: How is my data protected?
questions.answer:
We take privacy seriously:
• All data is encrypted in transit and at rest
• We never sell your personal information
• You can export or delete your data anytime
• We comply with GDPR and CCPA regulations

questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer:
To reset your password:
1. Tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
2. Enter your email address
3. Check your email for a reset link
4. Create a new strong password

questions.question: What do I do if the app keeps crashing?
questions.answer:
Try these steps:
1. Force quit and restart the app
2. Check for app updates in the App Store
3. Restart your iPhone
4. Ensure you have enough storage space
5. Reinstall the app if issues persist

If problems continue, contact support.

questions.question: My data isn't syncing properly
questions.answer:
To fix sync issues:
1. Check your internet connection
2. Sign out and sign back in
3. Enable Background App Refresh
4. Update to the latest app version
5. Check if our servers are operational
